medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 18 hours prior to presentation. The patient endorses intermittent nausea and subjective fever. No emesis, abdominal distention, or change in bowel habits noted. Maintains bowel function.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypothyroid, hyperlipidemia, multiple orthopedic procedures: R foot x2, L shoulder, L hand.
